Text: I'll comment when I am finished downloading. I am really wondering how it could only be 1.37 Gib when it's 2 movies.

'appreciate this, but:

why include over 40 unrelated torrents with the mere 2 files we want?

why not include a .nfo with the links? and why is there a .ico? all we want are the two avi.

& i'm sure that nobody would mind a .nfo describing the group & where to find more of their quality torrent files.

i'm going to check out this file in its entirety for three reasons: i want good etiquette or at least morality to prevail on intraweb (i am suspicious that TSV is hiding something in one of the files) - if TSV is a good group, i want to promote them to thank them for this torrent & help them out by getting them to stop the intrusive torrent crap - i drank a bottle of absynth that turned out to be antifreeze & i don't know how long i'll be able to remember the meaning of any of words before it kicks out and causes depth, so i want try at that good doing in case i really do die from drinkiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii
